Human Boring About Feed

Clifton

23 Jan 2016

I’m spending this weekend in Bristol, visiting my partner, a trainee nurse. We went on a little trip round the city, ending up at the Clifton Suspension bridge. Walking across the bridge, you had excellent views of the whole of Bristol1, and the other side the river Avon stretching towards the sea. Today’s picture is taken from the bridge, at night time.

  1. Unfortunately, my iPhone camera wasn’t able to get a good picture of the city at night time. I’ll have to return there again during the day. ↩
